item.title: The theory of entity updating

item.description:

and yet i’ve known about quadtrees (and most data structures) for quite a long time actually.
college level classes will teach you concepts like that. you wouldn’t know though.
[/quote]stop writing shit servers then[/quote]

maybe if people stopped flamming everything here, potential contributors would care more about actually contributing something?

item.title: The theory of entity updating
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“oksuper_, post:10, topic:331737”][quote author=blakeman8192 link=topic=428115.msg3157942#msg3157942 date=1269205057]

use a quadtree as a region system

and your problem should pretty much be solved

and yet just two weeks ago you didn’t know what a quadtree was… hmmmm

and yet i’ve known about quadtrees (and most data structures) for quite a long time actually.
college level classes will teach you concepts like that. you wouldn’t know though.
[/quote]

yes i wouldn’t because i’m not retarded enough to waste my money to learn concepts and things i have learned for free[/quote]haha it’s state money, not my money
http://www.k12.wa.us/runningstart/default.aspx
